seg1.error_type LIKE CONCAT('%', #{error}, '%')
group by seg1.annotator_id, seg1.sentence_id ) t1 join core.text_error_analysis_segments seg2 on t1.sentence_id= seg2.sentence_id join core.text_error_analysis_sentences sen1 on seg2.sentence_id = sen1.id join core.text_property prop1 on sen1.text_id = prop1.text_id where t1.sentence_id = seg2.sentence_id and t1.annotator_id = seg2.annotator_id and prop1.property_name = 'keeletase'
and prop1.property_value in
